mean_cn: n. 赦免；  v. 对…实行大赦
mean_en: a decision that a group of people will not be punished or that a group of prisoners will be allowed to go free
sentence: I was offered amnesty from the emperor and released from jail.
sentence_trans: 我得到了皇帝的赦免，所以我被释放了。
word_etyma: a无 + mnes记忆 + ty名词后缀 → amnesty 赦免
